channel.title: The i42 Forum RPG Boss Compendium
channel.description:
## Template: ` **Name:** ` ` **HP:** ` ` **Weaknesses:** ` ` **Location:** ` ` **Moves:** ` ` **Theme: ** ` ` **Drops:** ` ` **Extra Information:** ` ` **Apperance:**`
# I shall program an rpg with these bosses. It'd be fun ## Fyi Icibalus Nation is the main threat in the story
## Example: **Name:** The Michael of Screaming **HP:** Does HP really exist? **Weaknesses:** Often goes on for too long explaining something **Location:** The Shadow Realm **Moves:**
Vsauce: Spits Vsauce at target. Damaging them for 25 HP Where are your Fingers?: Give target confusion DONG: Whack your dong in target's face dealing them an eighth of their health. Half on critical hit.
**Drops:** An advertisement for the Icibalus Nation's attack **Extra Information:** Hey Vsauce Michael here. When is the day, you will die?, Major of the Icibalus Nation. **Apperance:** ![image|354x401](upload://hXx1ABpm9cdmOfo0QXQ80bASE8l.jpg)

item.title: The i42 Forum RPG Boss Compendium
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Name: PokemonKidRyan
HP: 8000
Weakness: Wolf Bond: Not being able to be with Wolfy. If Wolfy is killed, then his attack are weakened by 25%.
Location: Cave of Wolf.
Moves:
Bite - Deal 1000 damage to single target. Apply a stack of Bleeding and Vulnerable. Convert 50% of dealt damage to restore its own health.

Summon! - Summon Wolfy along his side. Which have 2000 HP. When Wolfy is alive, if you dealt damage to PokemonKidRyan, the 50% of the damage would be transfer to Wolfy. Wolfy could also buff PokemonKidRyan, granting him an attack buff that scales up to 150% for each turn Wolfy is alive. (Each turn increase the buff by 10%)

Boundary of Life and Death - After Wolfy have been slain. Pokemonkidryan would be casting this skill. Dealing 2000 damage 3 times to all your team. Also ignoring the Wolf Bond debuff he have for this turn.

Theme:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oNB-EUwmvuE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f_9J86_4Lxo
(Love those two game :P)
(Wait, those theme doesn’t fit, will do more research)
Drops:
Amulet of Wolf (100%) - Boost your attack and defense.
Wolf Paw (100%) - A pretty great weapon to attack.
Appearance:

Let me do some “intermediate research” on fursona, should I?

Read full topic

item.title: The i42 Forum RPG Boss Compendium
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
I’ll fix this.
Name: Planterror
HP: 10,000
Weakness: Fire.
Location: Forest, guarding Alfa’s Palace.
Moves:

Tangle: Tangle someone with your roots, tripping them, causing some damage and causing their next attack to fail.
Snap: Bite someone, causing moderate damage and a moderate chance of bleeding.
Vine whip: Whip two people with vines, causing small damage and a high chance of bleeding.
Paraseed: Put a parasitic seed in an opponent, leeching off their health.
Rapid Growth: Double all of your stats, and gain new moves while keeping the old ones.
Natural Syrup: Use your Canadian powers to heal yourself.
Chomp: Bite someone, dealing high damage and a slight chance of bleeding. You leech 10% of the health you’ve taken.

Theme:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=viVjBqIQNUg

Drops:
Vine: A whip weapon.
Bottle of syrup: Great healing item.
Mantrap mouth: Trap weapon.
Plant seed: Use to grow a plant that likes to hurt people.

Extra Info:
Was a plant grown by the mystical Canadian Alfa. Now guards her palace. Imbued with magical Canadian powers.

Appearance:

Planterror's Version:

Name: Plant
HP: Plant
Weaknesses: Plant
Location: Plant
Moves: Plant
Theme: Plant
Drops: Plant
Extra Information: Plant
Appearance: Plant

Read full topic

item.title: The i42 Forum RPG Boss Compendium
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Name: Insanity/Charlotte/Determination/Whatever you wanted to call him
HP: 3000
Weaknesses: If you have observer on your team, he will be embarrassed of himself and deal 100 less damage.
Location: Under…dog tale?
Theme:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=itg9RfC8Z18
Moves: Knife swipe - Deal 800 damage to all your team, applied a stack of permanent bleeding that dealt 200 damage every turn.
Knife stab - Deal 200 damage to a single target in your team. Applied a stack of Vulnerable onto him. (Vulnerable - Target receive 100% more damage from attack)
Pray RNGsus - Deal damage from 1 - 1000. Each time Insanity attack, the least limit of attack will raise by 100 and the threshold will increase by 200.
Double tap - The next attack he performed will be performed 2 times and it will deal AOE damage to all of your team.

Drops: Killer Knife (100%) Who doesn’t want a good damage weapon?
Flowey (10%) Upon consume, your character will level up for 5 levels.
Extra information: A teenager who…knows a lot?
Appearance:

Read full topic

item.title: The i42 Forum RPG Boss Compendium
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Name: The Noble Knight Davos
HP: 30,000
Weaknesses: Marluxion The Magical Monkey
Location: The castle of King Weizen
Moves:

  • Twin Banhammer - 50 damage. Does 5000 damage if Marluxion attacks on the same turn.
  • Special Inquisition - 50 damage. Does 5000 damge if the target is a WITCH!
  • Stonewall Shield - Blocks 50 damage. Blocks 5000 damage if attacked by a weapon dropped by a Moderator
  • T H I N K Y O U C A N T A K E M E - You won’t forget him, you pepsqueak

Theme: TBD
Drops: Davosian Armor - Powerful armor that augments all stats.
Map piece to Dev.
Banhammer Fragments
Extra Information: he’s also a vampire
Apperance: (can’t copypaste his avatar off Discord FeelsIcibalusMan)

Read full topic
